tagline.en: Sometims you gotta run before you can walk

introduce.en: We are EOStark – a group of devoted enthusiasts committed to evangelizing Blockchain Technology. We are all specialists in our own industries and have grouped our skillsets towards a common mission – to create a decentralized community anchored around transparency, liberty and justice. We are a fully independent and self-funded team based in Shanghai. We will act as a neutral platform to promote the EOS ideology and be the link connecting China to the Global EOS community. It is our aim to be a critical contributor in the evolution towards a decentralized community.
introduce.zh: EOStark由一群致力于布道区块链技术的狂热分子组成。虽然我们来自于不同的领域，但是我们的拥有共同的目标——参与创造一个透明、自由、平等的社区。作为一个独立财务的团队，我们有能力作为一个公允的平台来推广EOS生态，并且帮助中国EOS社区和海外EOS社区保持更紧密的联系。我们希望为这场去中心化革命贡献自己的绵薄之力。
